医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
特拉华大学研究人员开创了通用、经济的蛋白质组学样品制备方法蛋白质是执行我们细胞中大部分生物功能的主力。虽然我们从父母那里继承的基因，即我们所谓的基因组，是固定的，并且通常在我们的一生中保持不变，但随着年龄的增长，在不同的健康状况下以及受到刺激（例如药物治疗），我们体内的蛋白质却在不断变化。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/UD-researchers-pioneer-universal-economical-method-for-proteomics-sample-preparation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/UD-researchers-pioneer-universal-economical-method-for-proteomics-sample-preparation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f29c944b-1b09-4bc5-bb81-e931a78ae8be Tue, 11 Jun 2024 23:57:30 -0400 UD researchers pioneer universal, economical method for proteomics sample preparation
研究发现，青少年肥胖与女性中风风险较高有关研究发现，青春期或成年早期超重或肥胖会显着增加女性患脑血管疾病（尤其是缺血性中风）的风险，但男性则不会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Adolescent-obesity-linked-to-higher-中风-risk-in-women-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Adolescent-obesity-linked-to-higher-中风-risk-in-women-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af655872-4440-4aa8-b762-212af2d5f3a7 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 23:57:00 -0400 Adolescent obesity linked to higher stroke risk in women, study finds
护理人员的感知年龄影响痴呆症患者的健康萨里大学的一项研究表明，配偶照顾者的感觉年龄与患有痴呆症的亲人的感觉年龄有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Caregivers-perceived-age-affects-wellbeing-of-dementia-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Caregivers-perceived-age-affects-wellbeing-of-dementia-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a38ffc1-1a44-4f6a-bec8-5a8fd242147b Tue, 11 Jun 2024 23:46:42 -0400 Caregivers' perceived age affects wellbeing of dementia patients
新型机器人系统用于改善衰弱性眼病的治疗国王学院的研究人员与 NHS 基金会信托国王学院医院的医生成功使用了一种新的机器人系统来改善对衰弱性眼病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/New-robot-system-used-to-improve-treatment-for-debilitating-eye-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/New-robot-system-used-to-improve-treatment-for-debilitating-eye-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65f5f4ff-a55e-4942-bd84-4cd031490673 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 23:34:14 -0400 New robot system used to improve treatment for debilitating eye disease
德克萨斯州奶牛爆发 H5N1 流感引发多物种传播担忧研究确定 H5N1 流感是德克萨斯州奶牛爆发疫情的原因，强调了多物种病毒传播的风险以及对人类健康的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/H5N1-influenza-outbreak-in-Texas-dairy-cattle-sparks-multi-species-transmission-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/H5N1-influenza-outbreak-in-Texas-dairy-cattle-sparks-multi-species-transmission-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3c405a2-fd62-42fd-a34a-2148938d56dd Tue, 11 Jun 2024 23:04:00 -0400 H5N1 influenza outbreak in Texas dairy cattle sparks multi-species transmission concerns
研究发现，英国阿尔茨海默氏症患者很少适合使用新的疾病缓解药物《神经病学神经外科杂志》在线发表的研究发现，在英国，患有早期阿尔茨海默病的人很少适合使用旨在阻止病情进展的最新药物，但许多人仍然可能被转诊接受这些治疗＆精神病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Few-UK-Alzheimers-患者-suitable-for-new-disease-modifying-drugs-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Few-UK-Alzheimers-患者-suitable-for-new-disease-modifying-drugs-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72af2f8c-9605-4c0f-b47f-56a2a8eb499f Tue, 11 Jun 2024 22:55:06 -0400 Few UK Alzheimer's patients suitable for new disease-modifying drugs, study finds
研究发现 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗的短期副作用可增强长期抗体反应COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗接种的短期副作用与更高、更持久的中和抗体反应有关，表明其具有强大的免疫功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Study-finds-short-term-side-effects-of-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccines-boost-long-term-antibody-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Study-finds-short-term-side-effects-of-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccines-boost-long-term-antibody-response.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=464b34b5-1ac5-4b82-8069-943c604ced9f Tue, 11 Jun 2024 22:51:00 -0400 Study finds short-term side effects of COVID-19 mRNA vaccines boost long-term antibody response
怀孕期间接触邻苯二甲酸盐会增加高血压和先兆子痫的风险研究表明，怀孕期间接触邻苯二甲酸盐会增加患高血压疾病（包括先兆子痫）的风险。研究结果强调需要采取预防策略来降低这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Exposure-to-phaates-during-pregnancy-linked-to-increased-risk-of-hypertension-and-preeclampsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Exposure-to-phaates-during-pregnancy-linked-to-increased-risk-of-hypertension-and-preeclampsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a37e3279-ce5a-426f-a5f8-c640b196960a Tue, 11 Jun 2024 22:32:00 -0400 Exposure to phthalates during pregnancy linked to increased risk of hypertension and preeclampsia
研究揭示膝骨关节炎患者对运动无意识的恐惧膝骨关节炎 (OA) 是疼痛和关节僵硬的常见原因。虽然众所周知，体育锻炼可以缓解症状，但只有十分之一的人经常锻炼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Study-reveals-unknown-fear-of-exercise-in-knee-osteoarthritis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Study-reveals-unknown-fear-of-exercise-in-knee-osteoarthritis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17d7eb3b-1554-49bf-be5b-466a47e99629 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 22:29:52 -0400 Study reveals unconscious fear of exercise in knee osteoarthritis patients
研究表明，抗氧化剂可以对抗高脂肪饮食引起的女性生殖问题意大利的研究人员审查了生物基质中的抗氧化剂如何预防女性因高脂肪饮食引起的生殖问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Antioxidants-combat-high-fat-diet-induced-female-reproductive-issues-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Antioxidants-combat-high-fat-diet-induced-female-reproductive-issues-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86738c26-a5ec-46b3-a48d-1db03357d31f Tue, 11 Jun 2024 21:58:00 -0400 Antioxidants combat high-fat diet-induced female reproductive issues, study reveals
